name: BoatSounds
0:
”Alexa open Boat Sounds”
”Alexa ask Boat Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boat sounds
des:
Dive into the serene world of water with Boat Sounds, your ultimate Alexa skill for immersing yourself in the tranquil and captivating sounds of the sea. Whether you're a maritime enthusiast, in need of relaxation, or seeking a unique background ambiance, Boat Sounds offers an authentic nautical soundscape that bring the essence of the sea right into your home.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Boat Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
